::Zardus::

Zardus glances at the paperwork that Squizzy was putting away, 
looking from her to LadyHawk.

"And old ally's ship," he replies, "State of the art Predacon 
technology, I think the best on this planet."

He glances around the lab, "It'll be much more scientifically 
equipped than this ship."

Hearing Najah behind him, Zardus turns to look at the snake. "Yes?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> She looked at Zardus. She would have to wait to find out what 
> LadyHawk was doing.  She nodded to Zardus. "Where are we going?"
> 
> She started getting the glass trays and other equipment put away 
and 
> gathered all the paperwork, including the scans and other print 
outs.
